DOC.brief_title: Safety Effectiveness Agilus ( Hyaluronic Acid ) Ankle Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study compare safety effectiveness Agilus saline injection ( control ) treatment mild moderate ankle osteoarthritis . This multi-center , randomize , double blind , saline control , prospective study two ( 2 ) treatment group . The active group receive one injection Agilus per week three consecutive week total three injection . The control group receive one injection normal saline per week three consecutive week total three injection . Follow visit occur 4 week , 12 week 26 week follow third injection .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Chronic , unilateral ankle pain ( i.e. , one ankle ) least 6 month Diagnosis ankle OA confirm radiograph ( Xray ) clinical exam Are normally active , without aid mobility device ( crutch , walker cane ) Have use oral steroid within 30 day ( inhaled topical steroid acceptable ) Have receive intraarticular injection hyaluronic acid joint last 9 month Have receive steroid injection joint last 3 month Have previous surgery arthroscopy affect ankle last 12 month
